
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/twosedar/p/18696166" title="发布于 2025-02-01 09:03">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">对比使用DeepSeek与文新一言，了解DeepSeek的关键技术论文</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>DeepSeek是国内大模型技术的新秀，最近也在业界和媒体界火爆出圈，所以想学习一下其技术。<br>
大模型时代，学习知识，当然首先想到利用大模型，由于在过去一年，对DeepSeek使用不多，所以想和文新一言（4.0 Turbo）对比使用。<br>
通过对比，针对同一个问题“DeepSeek发扬开源文化，将核心技术都以论文形式发表，关键的技术论文都有哪些？”，文心一言效果明显好很多，但是这可能和DeepSeek的“联网搜索暂不可用”有关系。<br>
以下是使用结果<br>
<strong>文新一言问答结果：</strong><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085153301-377420659.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085243802-2003774688.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085301869-714094198.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085312653-1079044047.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>DeepSeek问答结果：</strong><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085419655-1511420406.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085434618-2092842379.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085447047-1826547536.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2960966/202502/2960966-20250201085501400-129551841.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>对以上回答结果进行核实</strong><br>
文新一言回答的四篇论文均为真实论文，结果正确，且按照时间排序，体验较好<br>
DeepSeek回答的结果中<br>
《DeepSeek-MoE: Towards Ultimate Specialization in Mixture-of-Experts Language Models》是正确的<br>
其他几篇论文，通过搜索引擎，均未搜索到相应的地址，应为虚幻回答<br>
《DeepSeek-Long: Advancing LLMs' Context Window to 128K through Positional Interpolation and Attention Optimization》<br>
《DeepSeek-R1: Retrieval-Augmented LLM with Real-Time Knowledge Update》<br>
《DeepSeek-Math: Improving Mathematical Reasoning in LLMs via Symbolic Supervision》</p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
